products.title: Lattice Black Roman Blind
products.description: Wonderfully bold, the lattice black roman blind brings a somewhat classical vibe into your home, with a touch of mediterranean influence. The sharpness of the black mixed with the velvety texture of the pattern makes this blind a smart-looking choice. Its soft enough though to d wonderfully bold, the lattice black roman blind brings a somewhat classical vibe into your home, with a touch of mediterranean influence.

products.title: Candy Stripe Jet Roman Blind
products.description: As crisp and smart as a pinstripe suit, the candy stripe jet has bags of minimalist style and a sharp modern look, wrapped in the form of a sumptuously luxurious roman blind. The tonal palette finishes that look perfectly, clean lines of pure black and white the perfect choice fo as crisp and smart as a pinstripe suit, the candy stripe jet has bags of minimalist style and a sharp modern look, wrapped in the form of a sumptuously luxurious roman blind.

products.title: William Morris Fruit Ebony Roman Blind
products.description: Bold, bright and beautiful, this fruit ebony roman blind, from their v&a collection of william morris designs, is a great way of adding a classical design touch to your scheme. This design dates back to around 1862 and is steeped in history, but still looks equally as contempo bold, bright and beautiful, this fruit ebony roman blind, from their v&a collection of william morris designs, is a great way of adding a classical design touch to your scheme.
